thread.title: New Zealand woman with terminal cancer does half marathon | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: New Zealand woman with terminal cancer does half marathon | Daily Mail Online

author: Sophie Haslett For Daily Mail Australia
title: New Zealand woman with terminal cancer does half marathon | Daily Mail Online
text: 'I was bawling, she was bawling': Woman with terminal cancer crosses half marathon finish line in wheelchair after she and her best friend made a pact to complete it together Vicki Walsh, 49, from New Zealand, used run regularly with her friend, Maree However, when Ms Walsh was diagnosed with cancer in 2011, things changed The 49-year-old was given 12-14 months to live, but has defied expectations She texted her friend, Maree Morpeth, recently saying she missed running And so Ms Morpeth hatched a plan to run a half marathon with Ms Walsh The pair completed a half marathon in Wellington with Ms Walsh in a wheelchair
